front.title: ARP/ND Synching And IP Aliasing without IRB

abstract.t: This draft proposes an extension to [RFC7432] to do ARP synchronizing and IP aliasing for Layer 3 routes that is needed for EVPN signalled L3VPN to build a complete IP ECMP. The phrase "EVPN signalled L3VPN" means that there may be no MAC-VRF or IRB interface in the use case. When there are no MAC-VRF or IRB interface, EVPN signalled L3VPN is also called as pure L3VPN instance.
